name: Ornithologie brooch
description: An awesome and fantastical layered verdigris butterfly filigree, silver wings and a silver bird skull with floral embossing - including 2 shimmering crystals. A one-of-a-kind design, this will look great for an enchanting, dark but feminine look, on a blazer lapel, as a cloak clasp or taking centre stage under a shirt collar. Approx 4.5cm x 5.5cm with antique bronze safety roll pin on reverse. Arrives gift-boxed.

name: Pretty Percher brooch
description: This is an adorable owl sitting on flowery branches, with a bright blue bloom next to him! Dusty blue owl and flower cabs with a swarovski crystal on silver filigree frames secured onto a brooch back, with a small drop chain and crystal detail. Approx 6cm total length and 3cm wide.

name: Snake Charmer necklace
description: Check it out - a stunning, slithering snake pendant, perfect for this season! The embossed, intertwined snake stamping will take centrepiece of your outfit and add an air of mystique to your look. Adorned with a crystal and silver flowers. On a 20" antique silver cable chain. Pendant size 6x5cm.

name: Prince of the Forest small pocket watch
description:
A proud stag stands surveying his forest in this gorgeous scenic design. Pretty green leaves, crystal beads and a mother-of-pearl flower swing along the chain to add some lovely detail. 

Chain is approx 32" and features a key charm with small crystals. Clock diameter 2.5cm.

This design has one-of-a-kind detail.

Will arrive in a gift box.

NB. I don't send the watch ticking - I don't think Royal Mail wouldn't like ticking packages, plus it saves the battery! So to start the watch - turn the dial on top to the correct time then press down again until you hear a click. To just open up the watch, press the little stud on the top of the fob down. Battery is replaceable once run down.

name: Jewelbound dragonfly ring
description: This divine little ring depicts a little winged critter enchanted by a tiny sparkly jewel... so magical and mysterious! An antiqued dark brass ox dragonfly with a rhinestone drop and chain connector and adjustable for the perfect fit.

name: Lexia bracelet with Preciosa™ stone
description: Beautiful bling! Check out the centre jewel a Preciosa™ rivoli faceted stone with a spectrum of lilac, pinks and greens as it turns in the light. The stone is set into floral antiqued silver frames and purple glass crystals connect the centrepiece onto the chain. On the end is a silver feather charm. Approx 8.5" long - will fit most wrists as the hook can do up any point on the chain. Centrepiece is 1.4 inches long.

name: Serenade haircomb
description: A whimsical steampunk-inspired petite comb that will pretty up your 'updo'! Or make a princessy hairstyle by taking a piece of hair from either side of your temples and gathering them at the back of your head with a small twist and securing it by pushing the comb downwards on it. Features a bronze gear piece, silver floral frame with a sparkly crystal centre, verdigris flowers and a tiny dragonfly. Approx 7.5cm x 4.5cm.

name: Les Oiseaux charm bracelet
description:
The tweetest, sweetest charm bracelet this side of summer! 'Les Oiseaux' means 'birds' in french, and just incase you forget this, it is spelt out for you in the pretty brass ox heart charms on this bracelet! 

There are no less than 28 charms - including 8 pretty glass pearls, 7 heart charms, 5 birdies, 3 buttons, 3 flower charms, and a butterfly! The soft pinky, white and lilacs of the pearls and flowers are beautifully contrasted with the dark antique brass ox colours. 

This is a one-of-a kind bracelet. Measures 6.5 in length - if you require it slightly longer please let me know. 

Arrives gift-boxed.

name: Crystal Web necklace and hairslide set
description:
A sparkly set of spidery-ness! A silver spider sits on a grey harlequin crystal set into vintage-style silver frames on a 18" antiqued silver cable chain.  

For your hair, a pretty slide with a spider enchanted by a crystal flower. Approx 7cm long. 

Arrives in a small gift box.

name: Knock & Enter Labyrinth-inspired locket
description: What better than to have a quirky fellow guarding your locket! It reminds me a little bit of the poor door knocker in the cult-classic film Labyrinth! You can even move the knocker part back and forth (though be careful as it's delicate!) Along the chain is a verdigris leaf branch, tiny key and greeny bronze glass pearls and the locket is filled with a sweet, spicy apple orchard scented solid perfume! On a medium length antique bronze chain measuring 24". Locket is approx 2.5cm. PS. Since I haven't filled the locket with the perfume yet there is the option to have this locket without it at the price of £13, please contact me before purchase if you want to arrange this.

name: 'Beastie' cuff - Hallowe'en inspired
description:
This little whimsical beastie on a hammered antiqued brass cuff is too cute to be scary! Just look at  those little teeth! 

A lovely unusual scrolling stamping with verdigree filigree is secured onto a statement large cuff. A beastie isn't just for hallowe'en you know... 

Measures approx 1 1/2 inches wide, one size fits all.

One of a kind design!

name: Ianthe crystal hair slides
description: In Greek mythology, Ianthe was a girl so beautiful, that when she died the gods made purple flowers grow around her grave. These vintage style hair slides are certainly something divine - with a rare pointed purple vintage crystal in a setting on one, and on the other, lovely floral detail with tiny crystals set into flowers. Great for the party season to add some glamour to your 'do!

name: Dragonfly Lake drop earrings
description: These divine chandelier drop earrings are reminiscent of a misty, quiet riverbank in the autumn with swirling waters, dragonflies and golden leaves and will add a touch of glamour to your look! Gorgeous victorian-style frames are layered with a dusty blue floral cabachon - and a dragonfly sitting atop! A golden leaf and blue jewel drop charm adds the finishing touch. Choose between gold plated ear hooks or gold-fill. Total drop length is approx 3 inches and 1.5 inches wide.

name: Enchanted perfume locket
description: Be enchanted by this dancing fairy on this pretty steampunk-style layered locket! A vintage brass locket with domed filigree design with a tiny Swarovski™ crystal swings from a pretty connector and a dragonfly charm flutters along the long chain. Choose your scent from the following on purchase if you have a preference: Sweet apple orchard Sweet Rose Rose Delight Creme Brûlée Spiced apple Violet musk Red rose Cherry Bakewell Chain length is approx 30" (long) Perfume handmade exclusively by Enchanted Bath & Body www.enchantedbath.co.uk NB. The perfume is beeswax based with perfume oils added. It will melt under high heat, so don't wear it on a very hot day or put it near a radiator!

name: 'Posie Picker' Holly Hobbie style brooch
description:
So adorable! This is a little brooch featuring a colourful country-chic Holly Hobbie girl putting together a bunch of wild flowers! It's mounted onto an antique gold frame and set on a laser-carved wooden backing.
Would look so cute on a summer blazer or your tea dress!

Roll pin on back. 4.5cm tall and 3.5cm wide.

name: Drink Me locket sterling silver chain
description: Alice in Wonderland inspired locket with a pretty teeny bow connector on a stunning sterling silver rope chain. The picture is sealed with a glass dome, designed and handmade by Roses Are Red. Chain length approx 22" and locket 3cm tall.

name: Little Rose perfume locket
description: A sweet little rose on a antiqued gold locket filled with sweetly scented rose perfume (if you're familiar with 'Lush' scents, it's very similar to Rosie Jam!) made exclusively by Enchanted Bath and Body www.enchantedbath.co.uk for Roses Are Red. It even has lovely specks of dusky pinky gold shimmer! The locket swings from a leafy branch and a vintage 16" brass chain. Locket approx 20mm. NB. The perfume is beeswax based with perfume oils added. It will melt under high heat, so don't wear it on a very hot day or put it near a radiator!

name: White Rabbit antique necklace, Alice in Wonderland inspired
description:
This is a gorgeous keepsake necklace featuring a handmade fancy Mr. White Rabbit glass domed cameo frame with rustic charms: a key, clockface, a pearl and a birdie. The detail on the picture is really sweet, just check out his dapper tweed jacket! 

On a lovely quality nickel free antiqued gold chain which has been plated to stand the test of time. 

Presented on a White Rabbit backing card and wrapped with tissue.

name: Alice's Adventures deluxe Pocket Watch
description:
A variation of the popular Alice's Day Dream watch - this is a special edition with different scenic decoration! 

The much-loved childhood story comes to life in this magical necklace - a large, working pocket watch depicting the White Rabbit running along, with Alice and even the cheshire cat if you look carefully! Embellished with fancy florals and a tiny Swarsvoki™ AB crystal.

Chain is approx 32" and features a key charm with small crystals. Clock diameter 4.5cm.

This design has one-of-a-kind detail.

Will arrive in a gift box.

NB. I don't send the watch ticking - I don't think Royal Mail wouldn't like ticking packages, plus it saves the battery! So to start the watch - turn the dial on top to the correct time then press down again until you hear a click. To just open up the watch, press the little stud on the top of the fob down. Battery is replaceable once run down.

name: Daisies and Buttercups earring set ★ £2 OFF! ★
description:
★ FLASH SUMMER SALE was £12 now only £10! ★

Did you ever pick daisies and buttercups when you were a child? I did! These little, sweet flowers remind of the prettiest flowers I could find as I scoured a sundrenched field!  
There are 3 pairs of earrings all so country shabby-chic! Realistic and delicate peachy-creamy coloured daisies with brown centres, tiny dusky blue daisys and little tiny yellowy buttercup flowers are all secured onto gold plated post backs. 

Peach daisies 11mm, blue daisies 9mm, yellow flowers 9mm approx. 

Arrives in a small gift box as shown!

NB. if you would like gold-fill earring backs, please contact me in advance to arrange this, and I can make them to order for you.

name: The Honey Bee lace necklace ★ £3 OFF! ★
description: ★ FLASH SUMMER SALE was £14.50 now only £11.50! ★ Bees are lovely things - they make lovely sweet honey and are very precious to the environment! This sublime necklace has a sweet little bumblebee heart pendant - a cast enamel ivory bee sits on a yellowy wallpaper with a tiny bee print. The pendant has a tiny rhinestone and a little bow ribbon and above the pendant is a yellowy frilly-edged rose. The pendant is on a 44" long rustic peach vintage lace - just tie in a bow behind your neck at whatever length you prefer.

name: Frosted Bloom earrings
description: These are lovely, enchanting earrings! Swarvoski crystal teardrops are finished with antique bronze scalloped caps and suspended from ornate verde filigrees and hand-finished with sparkly flower rhinestones. There is the option to have sterling silver hooks if you have sensitive skin. Drop length approx 5cm.

name: Dreamscape hair slide
description: This antique silver rococo-style feather stamping is so glorious - I just had to make it into a small but dramatic hairslide! Here it is then, with some enchanting embellishments - a verdigris flower and plenty of swarvoski crystals for the finishing touch. On an antique bronze hairslide. One-of-a-kind item. Approx 3.5" total length and 1.5" wide.

name: Prince of the Forest perfume locket necklace
description: A charming young stag standing proudly among the branches of the forest! This little picture locket is connected to the chain with a vintage leafy branch and on a antiqued bronze chain with a tiny dragonfly charm. It is filled with 'Enchanted Orchard', a sweet apple-floral scent, made exclusively by Enchanted Bath and Body www.enchantedbath.co.uk for Roses Are Red. Approx 16" chain with just pendant drop length just over 1". Locket size 2cm. NB. The perfume is beeswax based with perfume oils added. It will melt under high heat, so don't wear it on a very hot day or put it near a radiator!

name: Paris Romance perfume locket
description: A pretty vintage brass locket filled with 'Rose Delight' solid perfume - a yummy rose and almonds scent - like light pink french macaroons! A faux watch face with a pink flower and a brass butterfly gives the necklace lots of chic charm. On a goldplated curb chain approx 24 inches (medium length). Locket 30mm diameter. NB. The perfume is beeswax based with perfume oils added. It will melt under high heat, so don't wear it on a very hot day or put it near a radiator! Keep your necklace a cool, dry, dark place.

name: 'Gaia' antique ring
description: Gaia is the goddess of earth and nature, the perfect name for this ring! I just adore the detailing on this copper ring base - almost like something Elven from Lord of the Rings! The setting of the ring holds a lovely vintage cab of a blue rose with gold edging. Ring size adjustable to fit most.

name: Admire Me, Admiral perfume locket necklace
description:
Summer is here and the butterflies are out! Celebrate with this fancy butterfly locket in a perfect oval shape on a delicate vintage brass chain with a butterfly charm extender! 

Perfume inside is the sugary and girly Sweet Rose scent. Chain length 16" with a 4" extender. Locket is 30x20mm. 

NB. The perfume is beeswax based with perfume oils added. It will melt under high heat, so don't wear it on a very hot day or put it near a radiator! Keep your necklace a cool, dry, dark place.

name: Alice's Day Dream, deluxe pocket watch
description:
As Alice lay dreaming in the warm sunshine, a white rabbit bounded by, glancing at his pocket watch! I'm late, I'm late, for a very important date!

The much-loved childhood story comes to life in this magical necklace - a large, working pocket watch depicting the White Rabbit himself, embellished with fancy florals and a tiny Swarsvoki™ AB crystal. 

Chain is approx 32" and features a key charm with a tiny filigree detail. Clock diameter 4.5cm. 

This design has one-of-a-kind detail, so all versions of these necklaces are unique. 

Will arrive in a gift box. 


NB. I don't send the watch ticking - I don't think Royal Mail wouldn't like ticking packages, plus it saves the battery! So to start the watch - turn the dial on top to the correct time then press down again until you hear a click. To just open up the watch, press the little stud on the top of the fob down. Battery is replaceable once run down.

name: Summer Bloom pocket watch necklace
description: This is a bright and beautiful watch with a darling floral bloom decal and pretty golden colours. A rose and leaf charm complete the look! The watch is 4x3.2cm oval shape, on a long chain approx 32 inches. Arrives gift boxed. NB. I don't send the watch ticking - I don't think Royal Mail wouldn't like ticking packages, plus it saves the battery! So to start the watch - turn the dial on top to the correct time then press down again until you hear a click. To just open up the watch, press the little stud on the top of the fob down. Battery is replaceable once run down.

name: Lumière crystal bangle
description: This adorable bangle has some big sparkle! A vintage antiqued silver coloured base with gorgeous floral embossing is the setting for a harlequin cut round crystal - in an ornate frame for extra prettiness! Material - steel. 2 1/4" opening.

name: Evalyn bracelet watch and earrings
description:
This is a beautiful set of a vintage-style bracelet watch and drop earrings 
presented in a gift box, perfect for giving or keeping all for yourself! The watch is delicate and feminine - the face embellished with a bow and sparkles. The matching earrings are elegant with the sweeping silver scrolls, bows and teardrop glass pearls.

Earrings are on sterling silver hallmarked hooks, drop length 7cm approx. Watch is stainless steel with antiqued silver plated bracelet parts - approx 8 inches long. Will fit wrists of 5.5-7" circumference.

name: Flora Amara pocket watch
description:
'Flora Amara' means 'eternal flower' and is a perfect name for this timepiece with a pretty silver flower embellishment and tiny crystal rhinestones. It's connected to the antique bronze curb chain with a divine silver scrolled stamping. 

Chain is a mid-long length at 24" long and nickel free. End of the chain is a little crystal detail with a hook and eye clasp. 

Arrives in a gift box, ready to give, or to treasure yourself!


NB. We don't send the watch ticking - Royal Mail wouldn't like ticking packages, plus it saves the battery! So to start the watch - turn the dial on top to the correct time then press down again until you hear a click. To just open up the watch, press the little stud on the top of the fob down. Battery is replaceable.

name: Moonlight Sonata hair comb
description:
Want the finishing, glamorous touch to your hair style? If so, then you need, yes NEED, this divine one-of-a-kind vintage-style comb! 

A beautiful harlequin-cut glass crystal sparkles in the centre of ornate silver and antiqued bronze victoriana frames with two tiny flower and rhinestone details either side. Secured on a small nickel-free bronze comb. 

Will arrive in a gift box. 


Approx 6 x 6 cm.

name: Forget Me Not ring set
description: A darling set of 2 stacking rings - one a warm toned brass embossed band with a little blue daisy centre and the other a plain brass band with 'FORGET ME NOT' engraving. The rings are a medium size (ring size Q) - the daisy one is adjustable but the engraved band isn't, so please check your ring sizes before purchasing. They may fit nicely on your middle or index fingers! Please note these are brass rings which will be sealed in order that they do not discolour on your skin and keep their lovely colours.

name: The Old Gypsy Wagon necklace
description: You always used to see these old romany wagons at those old fashioned fairgrounds - to me they always looked beautiful. So imagine my happiness when I found these lovely copper vintage charms with floral embossing and actual movable wheels! It comes attached to a peachy frilly-edged rose and a trail of pearls up the chain. On antique copper chain, approx 20", with a matching hook clasp. © roses are red 07.2011

name: Forest Friends necklace - Snow White inspired
description:
Inspired by Grimm's Fairy Tale of Snow White.

After being freed by the huntsmen Snow White ran into the forest. As she made her way deeper into the forest and as the days passed, she became less frightened - because she befriended the animals! 

Here is a lovely cameo of a picture that reminded me of Snow White being led safely through the woods and towards the safety of the dwarves cottage. The picture is set into a glass dome and onto a floral antique silver frame with a pearly white flower charm and a sweet sparrow charm along the chain. 

Approx 20" chain length. Pendant is approx 3.5cm long. 

Contains glass.

name: The Flower Bunny mini brooch
description: Such a cute little bunny rabbit, with a little rose adornment to make him ever so pretty. A light but sturdy, easy to wear wooden lazer-cut bunny shape with a ceramic ivory rose. A perfect spring accessory! Perfectly petite at 3.5 cm tall and wide. Silver plated roll-pin back.

name: Mix & Match - leather cords and brass bands
description: These awesome wrist adornments are a great way to accessorize - in perfect autumn/winter hues with sweet details like little owls and pretty engravings! You can buy one, or your favourite pair, or buy a set of any 3 for £21 with the mix & match special offer! Just scroll through the pictures to see all the items. Genuine leather cords: 'Elven Glade' An elegant design made of a thick green cord with magnetic copper clasp and copper teardrop detail - 8" length 'The Owl' You won't be able to resist this little fellow - a little antique gold owl slider bead sits sweetly on a brown leather cord with antique bronze magnetic clip clasp. Just under 8 inches long. 'The Hunstman' Like something from a fairytale this is an antiqued brass axe with ornate floral embossing and a tiny crystal is secured on a dark brown 'bolo' leather cord with tiny owl slider bead and magnetic click clasp. approx 8 inches length. Brass bands: (please note these are not adjustable - standard size 7cm diameter and sealed with a varnish to prevent marking on the skin) 'Forget Me Not' There are two versions of this sentiment engraved bangle, one with a antique butterfly addition and one without! 'Swirled Leaf' A pretty victorian-style leaf embossing all the way around! Looks great with 'The Owl' leather cord. 'C'est La Vie; Whatever will be will be' An engraved band to remind you of this lovely sentiment. Would make a nice gift! NB. If you chose the 3 for £20 option please contact me after your purchase to let me know which ones you want. Thank you!

name: The Fairest of Them All mirror necklace
description: A true fairytale in a necklace - perfect for a gift to the fairest one you know! She can admire her beauty wherever she goes with this dreamy, heart-shaped mirror pendant - a lovely antiqued golden colour and tiny crystal rhinestones around the inside. A buttermilk rose and an ornate bail connecting it to the unusual heart chain adds charming detail. On a long vintage brass heart chain approx 30" but you can wear the chain shorter if you attach the clasp on one of the heart connectors lower down the chain. (see Size Guide section in the Item Guide) Mirror pendant is just over 4cm. Arrives in a small gift box, ready to give... or to treasure yourself!

name: Angelica Ltd Edition copper ring
description: A glorious ring to add to our Angelica collection.... a gorgeous victorian-style scrolling filigree in a lovely light copper with a soft pink 13x18mm cameo set into the lacy frame. Very 'romantic-chic'! Adjustable by squeezing or opening the band at the back - will fit most.

name: Peach Rose Blossom necklace
description: Blooming lovely! A sweet vintage-style necklace with a peachy carved rose on a ornate leaf gold plated filigree. From it sparkles a crystal tear-drop. On delicate 16" gold plated chain with a hook and eye clasp. A lovely item for summer.

name: Secret Cottage keyring charm
description: Think of an old country garden cottage, all metalwork rusted and wild flowers overgrowing around the locked door... this would be the kind of lost key that would open the door! Hang it on your keyring or your bag and take it everywhere with you just incase you come across one! Features a glorious antique copper key adorned with a rustic rose and filigree detail and etched lettering, with a sparkly czech crystal and a copper butterfly connector. The clasp opens by squeezing the lower part of the hook until it unhinges. Approx 11cm length. This item is a one-off design. © roses are red 07.2011

name: The Great Lion; Narnia-inspired necklace
description: The stuff of dreams! This legendary necklace will remind you of the great Aslan from the wonderful story of The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe. A brass lion is the central feature and by his paw there is a crystal flower detail and has swirling golden scroll stampings, verdigris leaves and flower embellishments along the connector. Chain length approx 16" (short). Connector pendant approx 7cm width and 4.5cm tall. Hook and eye clasp.

name: Cloud Nine necklace
description: All this bright weather making you feel on top of the world? Then you need this gorgeous necklace - a happy birdie flying by a fluffy cloud! A 4.5cm floral two tone resin plaque with a brass sparrow embellishment and a feather brass wrap on one side and tiny golden pearls attaching it to the lovely brass cable chain. Approx 16", sits in the middle of your chest.

name: Mystifly ring
description: This mystical-looking ring is made of a brass leaf stamping that I curved round and embellished with a filigree, a tiny dragonfly and finished off with a tiny crystal rhinestone. It isn't quite pliable enough to adjust to any size but will fit a small/medium-average. Approx 2cm diameter. © roses are red 07.2011

name: Country Lane perfume locket
description: How cute! A little bicycle among some sweet florals. Inhale the scent deeply and you can just imagine you're cycling down a little French country lane, lined with flowers and patisseries! A lovely rose, almond and vanilla perfume is hidden inside this locket with a top layer of pink shimmer. On 18" antiqued chain with a tiny pink ceramic rose charm. Extender chain is approx 5cm long for adjustable lengths. Locket 20mm. Perfume handmade exclusively by Enchanted Bath & Body www.enchantedbath.co.uk NB. The perfume is beeswax based with perfume oils added. It will melt under high heat, so don't wear it on a very hot day or put it near a radiator!

name: Forest Treasure earrings gift set
description: A sweet pair of earrings - little treasures you'd find deep in the forest: lovely burgundy flowers and bright toadstools to match! The toadstool earrings are made from vintage enamelled charms and have lovely glossy red and grey colouring, and the 3D flowers have pretty petal texture and a pinky centre. Toadstool earrings: 6x11mm Flowers: 10mm approx. Both on gold-plated backs and presented in a lacy gift box as shown.

name: Amber Rose pocket watch
description: See life through amber coloured glass! This is a lovely, romantic pocket watch on a chain featuring a buttermilk vintage rose and leaf charm and two tiny swooping swallows. The perfect accessory for those late afternoon tea parties and long evenings with a cider in the pub garden! Chain approx 30" and pocket watch pendant is 1" diameter. Will arrive in a gift box. NB. I don't send the watch ticking - I don't think Royal Mail wouldn't like ticking packages, plus it saves the battery! So to start the watch - turn the dial on top to the correct time then press down again until you hear a click. To just open up the watch, press the little stud on the top of the fob down. Battery is replaceable once run down.

name: Dreams Take Flight ring
description:
Divine golden band of a swooping bird with a tiny crystal sparkle - let your dreams soar! 

This item is raw brass, do not get it wet! Approx 2cm diameter. Can be pulled open for a larger fit. 

Also available in antique silver plated.

name: Rose Blush perfume locket - choose your scent
description:
A darling deep pink rose on a antiqued gold locket filled with sweetly scented rose perfume made exclusively by Enchanted Bath and Body www.enchantedbath.co.uk for Roses Are Red.

The locket swings from a leafy branch and a vintage 16" brass chain.

Locket approx 20mm.

NB. The perfume is beeswax based with perfume oils added. It will melt under high heat, so don't wear it on a very hot day or put it near a radiator!

name: Golden Carousel necklace
description: For all those who loved funfairs as a child, you can just imagine riding the brightly coloured ponies with a candyfloss or ice cream in one hand and the birds passing by overhead! Just for you, I found the daintiest, prettiest carousel charm and added it onto a lovely antique gold chain, with a tiny brass birdie! A carousel charm measuring 2cm with heart motif and a top flag is filled with pearls and with it, a tiny rhinestone sparkle! Chain is approx 16" (short length). A perfect, versatile summertime accessory.

name: Oak Tree Blossom earrings
description: A more spring-like version of the autumn Oak Tree earrings with pink blooms instead of the white ones (shown in pic 5). These earrings have the same golden warmth - sparkling amber crystals suspend coppery leaves with peachy-pink resin flowers and gold-plated acorn charms. Drop length just shy of 2", with gold tone clasp hooks. Choose the 'gold-fill' hooks option if you commonly experience irritation with earrings.

name: Annalisa vintage ring
description: A delightful rare vintage 'spoon handle' style ring, with beautiful floral and scrolling embossing all the way round, and charming scalloped edging. These are bought directly from a vintage jewellery supplier and I couldn't bring myself to add anything to them because they were perfect as they were! Fits a small/medium. Can adjust the size to fit because of the wrap around nature of the ring.

name: Fantasia toadstool earrings
description: Wear a bit of magic in your ears with these stunning glistening enamel toadstool earrings! Brightly coloured pairs of toadstools in 2 colour choices sit on gold-plated backs as shown in pics. Measure approx 11mm x 6mm.

name: The Looking Glass necklace
description: An this enchanting and exquisite petite antique-style mirror charm hangs from a delicate gold chain to bewitch all who lay their eyes upon it! A pretty faceted cab is the mirror part, with an ornate setting and a single rhinestone makes up this divine 30mm pendant. A very special necklace indeed! Chain length is approx 16" with a 2" extender with pearl detail by the clasp.

name: Stargazer necklace
description: Unicorns are fascinating mythical creatures and there is also a constellation named after one (Monoceros - their Greek name), so here we have a golden unicorn dancing under a glistening star! An antique gold plated charm is suspended from a yellow rose, a string of golden glass pearl and a brass star charm with a rhinestone embellishment. Length approx 16". Unicorn charm is 2cm tall. © roses are red 07.2011

name: The Lost Key necklace
description: A stunning fairy tale key fit for a princess! Embellished with antique silver flowers and sparkly rhinestones and strung from a small crystal on an antique bronze curb chain. Chain approx 24" and key pendant approx 4.5cm. © roses are red 07.2011

name: The Little Door, Alice in Wonderland necklace
description: 'There were doors all round the hall, but they were all locked; and when Alice had been all the way down one side and up the other, trying every door, she walked sadly down the middle, wondering how she was ever to get out again. Suddenly she came upon a little three-legged table, all made of solid glass; there was nothing on it except a tiny golden key, and Alice's first thought was that it might belong to one of the doors of the hall; but, alas! either the locks were too large, or the key was too small, but at any rate it would not open any of them. However, on the second time round, she came upon a low curtain she had not noticed before, and behind it was a little door about fifteen inches high: she tried the little golden key in the lock, and to her great delight it fitted!' Lewis Carroll This is a sweet little golden door-plate charm with the tiny key that opens it, inspired from the passage above from 'Alice in Wonderland'! It has charming delicate embossing detail and a pink crystal rhinestone. It is strung onto delicate gold plate 16" chain. Door-plate charm is approx 1". © roses are red 07.2011

name: Tea in the Garden necklace
description: One lump or two? A fondant fancy with that ma'am? It's time for tea in the garden with this cute pink china teacup on its matching saucer with a lovely floral design, hanging on a vintage brass chain complete with a golden butterfly flying by! Chain length approx 16". Teacup charm approx 1.5cm. © roses are red 07.2011

name: Strawberry Fields vintage swing necklace ★ £3 OFF ★
description:
★ FLASH SUMMER SALE was £15 now only £12! ★ 

Strawberry fields forever! This is a dreamy, delicate necklace featuring a little vintage swing charm with seats that rocks back and forth! A antiqued brass ox strawberry branch connects it to the antique gold chain. 

A creamy candyfloss pink flower just above the swing charm adds lovely, girly detail.  Evokes the memory of those long warm summer evenings in the park or garden. 

Chain length approx 18"

name: Sunkissed mini bow pin
description: The sweetest little bow pin ever! An enamelled warm yellowy vintage bow from 1980's new stock on a gold plated base and in perfect condition! This would look so cute perched on a breast pocket or a summer blazer lapel! Measures a perfectly petite 22mm high! NB. Unlike all my other items, this item was not handmade by me, I have bought it from one of my vintage suppliers and selling it 'as is'. It didn't need anything adding to it, it's perfect as it is!

name: Angelica vintage mini comb & bookmark ★  £4 OFF! ★
description:
★ Was £12 now only £8! ★

Accessories that would look sweet on your dresser! A darling vintage mini comb with pink pearl comb-part set onto an embossed brass handle, featuring a tiny pink lady cameo on both sides. To match, a little brass vintage scroll-edged bookmark with a 13x18mm pink lady cameo centrepiece. 
These items will require delicate handling - do not give to children! They are lovely items to pass down your generations. 

Comb 12cm approx height and bookmark is approx 57mm height.

name: Maisie Sweet Cheeks necklace, Holly Hobbie style.
description: This adorable little girl with an innocent but cheeky face will surely melt anyone's heart - just look at the flowers in her hat and her little dolly! So sweet to wear around your neck and will add a touch of vintage country chic to your look. A Holly Hobbie cameo is set onto a vintage verdigris victorian-style stamping and is hooked onto delicate copper plated brass peanut chain with a little vintage butterfly charm. Approx 18" length - pendant sits in the middle of the chest and is approx 4.5cm wide and 3cm tall.

name: The Snow Princess heart necklace
description: 'The Dwarves had a transparent coffin of glass made, so that she could be seen from all sides, and they laid her in it, and wrote her name upon it in golden letters, and that she was a king's daughter. Then they put the coffin out upon the mountain, and one of them always stayed by it and watched it. And birds came too, and wept for snow-white, first an owl, then a raven, and last a dove. And now snow-white lay a long, long time in the coffin, and she did not change, but looked as if she were asleep, for she was as white as snow, as red as blood, and her hair was as black as ebony. ' This necklace is inspired by the fairytale 'Snow White' and her still, cold beauty while she lay motionless in the glass case - her frozen heart waiting to be melted by her true love; an unusual glass heart pendant with frosted lacy etching and a pure white bloom of flowers. A pretty antique bail connects it to the 18" chain. Heart pendant approx 1". Was £14, now £11.95!

name: Cherry Blossom Tree perfume locket
description: Smell as sweet as a blossom tree with this delightful perfume locket necklace. A cute birdie swoops around the pretty flowers - you can almost hear his cheerful song! A 1" tall silver locket is embellished with a tiny bird and pearl, swinging from a floral connector and lilac swarovski bicone crystals. Chain length approx 18". The solid perfume is a heady floral lavender and violet scent called 'Twylight' made by Sarah at www.enchantedbath.co.uk. NB. The perfume is beeswax based with perfume oils added. It will melt under high heat, so don't put it near a radiator! © roses are red 07.2011

name: Angelica 'Royal Bloom' ornate cuff
description:
A real showcase piece!

A stunning ornate antiqued copper cuff embellished with a silver celtic filigree and a framed angelskin 18mm x13mm pink cameo with silver leaf and swarvoski crystal accents. 

Cuff opens at the front and snaps shut. 



©Roses Are Red 2012

name: Angelica Princess earrings
description: These are delicate and divine earrings: black cameos set into lacy antiqued bronze frames with solid sterling silver posts and butterfly fastenings - so they are ideal for those with sensitive skin. They arrive perfectly presented in a sweet square black box. Settings approx 15mm tall and 12mm wide. If you'd like the box gift wrapped, please click on the heart icon below and select the relevant option.

name: Genesis necklace
description: Genesis means 'beginning' or 'new creation' and this serene single bird flying over a green globe charm is like a flight over a new world. The ball charm has been hand-dyed to a lovely fresh green but with some areas of the dye have worn off - this gives it a lovely old-aged feel. The pendant is suspended on a 18" silver plated curb chain and has a 2" extender - the longest length you can wear this chain is 20". © roses are red 07.2011

name: Marianne the Valiant cutlass brooch
description: This brooch is named after the strong-willed Anne Dieu-le-Veut (also known as Marianne) a lady who married a pirate in the 17th Century... only for him to be killed by another buccaneer. When Anne challenged him to a duel to avenge his death, he proposed to her because he so admired her courage... Wear this little brooch when you need to have courage to fight for what you believe! It features a lovely raw brass engraved cutlass on a leafy branch and circular floral filigree, with a tiny creamy rose. Measures 2.5" tall by 1.25" wide. One-of-a-kind item.

name: Vintage French Love Writing Kit
description: Are you a hopeless romantic or hopelessly in love? Either way, this is the ULTIMATE gift for the one you love - why not write her (or him!) a love letter in the good old fashioned way? This is a perfect gift that should not just be for Valentine's day - how about anniversaries, birthdays, perhaps a special way to propose, or just because... To add to this gift, you could choose an item from the 'Romantic Notions' collection and the gift wrap option and I will match the wrapping to your writing kit using similar seals and papers... oh la la, I am coming over all lovey dovey just thinking about it! Your kit includes: 1 sheet of vintage writing paper Lace edged paper Heart sticker with bird 1 French love sticker seal Vintage twine Lace and wire red flower Kraft envelope Brass scroll corner seal You can wrap and seal your letter in any way you like or you can follow these simple steps and look at the pictures for inspiration: 1. Write your letter on the lined paper, in your bestest handwriting of course! 2. Fold your letter in 3 and wrap the lace paper strip around it. You can secure it with the twine if you like and/or your heart seal! (pic 3) 3. Make your letter look pretty by putting your French Love sticker on the front. (pic 4) 4. Place your letter carefully in your kraft envelope and wrap your lace ribbon around it. 5. Take off the backing paper to the brass scrolling corner and press down on the corner flap of your envelope (pic 5) to add the finishing touch! Twist your flower wire around the lace knot/bow on the front and then write your love's name somewhere nearby! Et Voila, ready to give! Your true love will never be more impressed (especially if it comes with a lovely piece of Roses Are Red jewellery!)

name: Bye Bye Baby Bluebird ring
description: Ahh, so sweet for Spring! A baby bird leaves it's nest for the first time and explores the flowers around him! Twinkly rhinestones and a tiny silver bird adorn a blue resin floral cabochon mounted on a silver plated ring base. Adjustable ring. Blue cab size is 2cm approx.

name: Roses are Red earrings
description: These pretty vintage enamel red and gold-tone roses are handsome enough for the Queen's garden indeed! Mounted on gold plated earring posts with butterfly backs and measure 12mm.

name: Flight of Fancy earrings
description: Darling drop earrings made of green patina filigrees embellished with scrolling brass hearts and sparkly rhinestone drops! Sweet tiny brass swallows flutter above. The french style anti-allergenic hooks are top quality gold-fill (thicker layer of pure gold than gold plated). Would make a lovely gift, just remember to purchase a gift box! Drop length approx 5cm.

name: Heart's Desire locket necklace ★ £2 OFF! ★
description: ★ FLASH SUMMER SALE was £13.50 now only £11.50! ★ A stunning and unusual heart locket ready to hold your secrets! The scrolling detail, the antiqued colour and texture adds wonderful charm and the pink and white porcelain rose adds a fairytale touch. Open the locket to find a bit of raspberry lace to soak with your favourite perfume, or you can replace it with a little love note, or a secret wish! Chain is a dark antiqued bronze cable chain and approx 18" and has a 2" extender to adjust the length up to 20". Locket is approx 18mm.

name: Past Times pocket watch necklace
description: Every girl needs a pocket watch! This is a charming, vintage glass globe set into a reddish brown real wooden frame. You can see the mechanics on the back of the watch - very cool! To add prettiness, a brass butterfly flutters up the chain with a tiny scroll connector. Perfect if you're going for that 'Librarian-chic' look! On a long antique bronze curb chain approx 30" (see Size Guide section in the Item Guide) Arrives in a small gift box, ready to give or to treasure yourself! NB. We don't send the watch ticking - Royal Mail wouldn't like ticking packages, plus it saves the battery! So to start the watch - turn the dial on top to the correct time then press down again until you hear a click. To just open up the watch, press the little stud on the top of the fob down.

name: Love Angel scented brooch
description: This is a rather magnificent, stunningly detailed creamy pink large heart brooch measuring 55mm X 48mm. The scent is just as soft and dreamy as the brooch itself - a rose and vanilla scent! Makes a wonderful gift.

name: Je T'Aime, Lock & Key necklace (sterling silver chain)
description: Oh la la! A sweet little sentiment on a pendant is so chic and romantic! This vintage charm with irresistible embossing detail is joined by a silver lock charm with a tiny flower and swings from the delicate sterling silver chain by a sparkly swarvoski AB crystal bead. Love is in the air! Would make the perfect gift for the one you adore... just remember to get a gift box! Chain length approx 16", pendant approx 2cm. 2 in stock - choose between a dusky pink flower (shown) and a dusky mauve flower. © roses are red 09.2011

name: Frozen Planet no.2 sterling silver necklace
description: It's a beautiful sight when the world is iced over - all white, pure and sparkly! A very special necklace is here for Winter - an AB crystal spins in this mini sterling silver globe charm with a tiny swallow charm (finding his way to warmer climes - probably!) The charms, chain and clasp are all sterling silver - perfect for those with sensitive skin. Chain is 18". Pendant 1.5cm tall. Gift box is recommended with this item as it is delicate. NB.Pic 5 shows the previous Frozen Planet design. You will receive the necklace shown in the first 4 pics.

name: Two Hearts, One Love necklace
description: Fall in love with this romantic necklace! A double-set antiqued brass heart is decorated with adorable heart, flowers and ribbon embossing. Around the filigree edging there are 5 tiny lilac vintage crystals to add lovely colour and sparkle! The pendant is approx 1" tall and wide, and is attached to the antiqued curb chain by a sweet filigree bail. With hook and eye clasp. Chain length approx 18".

name: Angelica in the Garden brooch gift box
description: A very special Angelica item - this time she is in the garden, enjoying the blooms of pretty flowers around her - and even a little butterfly! So feminine, this one-of-a-kind item makes the perfect gift for a loved-one. This is a large brooch (5x6cm) with a 3x4cm pink and cream cameo set into a antique bronze frame with tiny antiqued flowers. Arrives in a pretty gift box embellished with Swarvoski crystals.

name: First Kiss... vintage gift tin
description: Too sweet! Bring back childhood nostalgia with this beautiful, rare Sarah Kay tin with a picture of a little girl kissing a sweet shy boy! Inside you'll find a 16" necklace with a vintage brass charm of two kissing kids on a gold plated chain with a tiny sparkling crystal, old vintage writing paper, vintage lace and a pink vintage button... you can use the tin to store little trinkets and more memories of your love! The tin is vintage, but in good condition - only very slight nicks off the paint on the underneath side. Just under 5cm length. You will receive the design shown in the first two pics.

name: Daphne crystal drop necklace
description: Daphne was a Greek minor goddess who got changed into a pretty laurel bush after being chased by Apollo and her beauty lived on - and the evergreen bush, which flowers in late winter, was named after her... This necklace is an elegant celebration of flowering laurels; a decorative art nouveau filigree with a tiny crystal centre is suspended on silver plated chain and from it hangs a swarvoski AB teardrop crystal. Chain length approx 16.5" with a 2" extender for adjustable length. Filigree pendant approx 56mm wide.

name: As Curious As Can Be plaque necklace
description: For all the curious cats out there, this is a necklace just for you! An Alice in Wonderland inspired domed cameo with a whimsical saying is set onto a divine antiqued brass art nouveau frame, complete with sparkly swarovski rhinestones and a tiny silver flower. Chain is a delicate antique bronze and 16" so it sits in the middle of your chest.

name: Crystallite drop earrings
description: Crystals are wonderful natural creations, aren't they? These earrings have been inspired by that wonder - light and simple yet elegant. Small copper trellis filigrees hang from antiqued french hooks and at the end sparkles lovely AB czech crystals. Drop length approx 3.5cm. © roses are red 07.2011

name: Angelica Verde cuff
description:
Another addition to the Angelica range - a grand ornate antiqued brass bangle mounted with a silver setting and a 15mm green cameo of an elegant lady in the centre! Sparkle is added with the swarvoski crystal accents.

This cuff is slide on/off. Approx 7cm width. Will fit wrists between 5-7" and is slightly adjustable. 

©Roses Are Red 2012

name: Fly Away Home earrings
description: Sweet little sparrows flying away home! They are 18mm from beak to tip of tail and face each other. How can you resist? The birdies are antique silver plated with silver-plated posts or you can choose the sterling silver backs (posts and butterfly back) for those with ultra sensitive skin. These arrive in a pretty dark blue gift box - extra protection in the post and so you have a safe place for them to nest!

options.name: Raw Brass with gold plated posts

name: Crystal Garden brooch
description: This divine brooch evokes the scene of a silvery winter garden with a hint of lush evergreen, sparkling as the dew shimmers on the wild roses... A vintage antiqued brooch is embellished with a green patina leaf and tiny crystals, with a safety roll pin back. Measures 68mm wide x 35mm tall. Matches the Winter Wildrose earrings. Gift boxing recommended!

name: The Wishing Well necklace
description: Only in fairy tales do wishing wells look like this! Now you can have your own one to wish with as many times as you like... this is a dreamy silver charm with 'Wishing Well' engraved at the top and twisted roped sides, with tiny sparkly rhinestones just to add that touch of magic. A Swarovski crystal swings just over the well. The charm is attached to the chain by a pretty floral connector and purply blue crystal beads and you'll see a tiny bird flying just above. Antique silver chain is approx 18". Pendant approx 2cm. © roses are red 07.2011

name: The Old Spinning Wheel necklace
description: Straight out of a fairytale comes this delicate sterling silver spinning wheel charm - it's joined by a sparkling AB crystal and swings from a copper chain complete with a deep red flower detail and a swooping sparrow flying above... just beautiful! Chain approx 18" long. Hook & eye clasp as shown. Silver charm approx 2cm. © roses are red 08.2011

name: Fantasia brooch
description: Unicorns are so fascinating and mythical... I just had to make this gorgeous galloping unicorn into a brooch! He is secured onto a bronze filigree backing and surrounding him are tiny silver flowers and one single sparkling rhinestone. Just dreamy! Antiqued bronze roll pin back as shown. Approx 5cm from horn to hoof! © roses are red 07.2011

name: Secret Admirer envelope locket
description: A love letter with a french twist! Open up the envelope to reveal a little note inside - very romantic and a perfect gift for the one you love! An antique gold small envelope decorated with a pretty filigree and a rhinestone hangs from pretty sparkly swarovski crystals and delicate vintage chain. The clasp has an art nouveau style connector. Approx 16" chain. © roses are red 07.2011

name: Crystal Celsia perfume locket
description: A little bird flies over a garden filled with open, beautifully scented flowers! This lovely embossed locket swings from an AB crystal and a delicate silver curb chain and is filled with solid perfume. The scent is a soft and sweet musky floral. NB. The perfume is beeswax based with perfume oils added. It will melt under high heat, so don't put it near a radiator! Chain length approx 18". Locket approx 2cm diameter. © roses are red 07.2011

name: Swallowtail Butterfly necklace ★ £2 OFF! ★
description: ★ FLASH SUMMER SALE was £9.99 now only £7.99! ★ There aren't many things as delightful as a colourful butterfly! Swallowtails is the name of colourful group of the fluttery fellows... now you don't have to chase them, you can wear one around your neck! Vintage enamel pendants hang from a dainty 18k gold plated chain - short length approx 17" (will sit in the middle of your chest). There are 5 colourway options though they are all multi-coloured. © roses are red 07.2011

name: Little Suzy, Holly Hobbie ring ★ £2 OFF! ★
description: ★ FLASH SUMMER SALE was £6.95 now only £4.950! ★ What a cutie! A darling Holly Hobbie style print on a 13x8mm cameo is set into a gorgeous ornate filigree ring. Meet Suzy, an adorable cheeky-looking country girl (and her puppy!) who is sure to make you smile! There is so much charm in this picture, the flower in her mouth, the dimple on her chin and the flowers in her hat! Ring is antique bronze, medium sized but adjustable to fit.

name: Angelica pocket watch
description: This is a divine and feminine locket with decorative scrolling embossing and a tiny pale pink cameo with a lacy edge. Inside there is a actual working watch! On the pendant sits a pretty deep red rose. The unusual chain is a lovely dark antique bronze colour. On a long chain approx 32" (see Size Guide section in the Item Guide) The watch fob is approx 1". Arrives in a small gift box, ready to give or to treasure yourself! If you want it gift wrapped please go to the Gift wrap & box listing and choose the 'gift wrap' option. NB. We don't send the watch ticking - Royal Mail wouldn't like ticking packages, plus it saves the battery! So to start the watch - turn the dial on top to the correct time then press down again until you hear a click. To just open up the watch, press the little stud on the top of the fob down. © roses are red 07.2011

name: Special Delivery Upgrade (recommended)
description: A lot of my items are one-offs, or limited editions and can't always be made again, so I always worry about them in the post! Please select this option if you want some reassurance your parcel is safe, or your item needs to reach you urgently and/or it is particularly valuable (over £30 or contains one-off designs) as this will insure the contents against loss or damage. Recorded delivery does not insure jewellery in the post. **If you spend over £50 you will get upgraded to Special Delivery for free.** Note that to receive Special Delivery there needs to be someone in to sign for it, otherwise it may find its way to your local Sorting Office and then eventually back to me if it doesn't get collected! For insured overseas post please contact me before purchasing any items. Thank you!

name: Gift Box and wrap
description: Now you can choose how you'd like your item sent to you! Without these options, your item will still arrive looking pretty and protected in the post, but getting it boxed or wrapped means your item can be extra special and ready to give as a gift. NB. All of the pocket watches come in a gift box as standard but if you'd like it gift wrapped too, please choose the wrap option. A standard gift box means your item will be placed in a Roses Are Red branded box (see pic 2 for examples) - ready for wrapping to give as a gift or ideal for keeping your own Roses Are Red treasures safe. Gift Wrap is where I will wrap your present without putting it in a gift box first, tie it with ribbon or twine and include a tag or a space for writing on the wrap. See pic 4 for examples. Examples of Gift Box + Wrap Choosing the Gift box & wrap option means I'll put the item in a box and then gift wrap it in pretty paper and then tie it with ribbon or twine with a tag or a space for writing. The boxes I use are made from recycled materials. Please note the pictures shown are samples and so your gift wrap might look a little different but I promise it will look just as pretty and will always have the Roses Are Red logo on somewhere. I can also send the item to another address if you'd like it to go straight to the person receiving the gift. If you want it wrapped in a certain way or in a certain colour, or you want me to write on the tag, please email me in both cases and I'll see what I can do! IMPORTANT: If you're ordering more than 1 item and you only want 1 gift box, you need to specify which item you want gift boxed, so please drop me an email (sales@lucylockettloves.co.uk) as soon as you have placed your order!

name: The Adventures of Little Boy Blue brooch ★ £3 OFF! ★
description: ★ FLASH SUMMER SALE was £6.50 now only £3.50! ★ What cheeky boy is this and what has he done to be running away? It's Little Boy Blue scampering away after doing something naughty no doubt! No wonder he gets so tired and has to have a snooze under the haystack! Join in the fun with this charming little brooch. We love the Sarah Kay illustrations and we especially love this one - a summery warm picture full of delightful details! In a copper-plated brass lace setting with small pin back. Approx 30mm x 22 mm.

name: Oui ou Non? earrings
description: A sweet pair of embossed 'Oui' and 'Non' antique silver french charms and filigrees hanging from antique silver plated hooks. Option to upgrade to sterling silver hooks. Approx 4.5cm from top to bottom.

name: Angelica perfume locket ring
description: A treasure of a ring in our popular Angelica range, this time a lovely blue cameo. But most impressively - to keep your wrists smelling sweet - open the locket to find a lovely vanillary rose musk solid perfume*! Perfect. Vintage gold tone ring finding - this isn't raw brass so the colour will stay shinier and newer! Adjustable so will fit most. *Solid perfume is made from a natural base of beeswax and cocoa butter with perfume oils. Please do not leave this item in direct sunlight or get it wet. The perfume will melt at very high temperatures. Refills available at a small charge.
